qa.question: Main Phone Use
qa.answer: WhatsApp, Snapchat, Instagram, YouTube, UPI banking, Google Docs, Zoom.

qa.question: Phone Sharing
qa.answer: Rarely, only urgent calls. Don’t like sharing due to personal chats/photos.

qa.question: Favorite Apps
qa.answer: Snapchat filters/streaks, Instagram reels. Know they collect data but not sure extent.

qa.question: Permission Reading
qa.answer: Allow quickly if known app, read if suspicious.

qa.question: App Trust
qa.answer: Play Store reviews, friends’ use, professional design.

qa.question: Content Deletion
qa.answer: Yes, deleted screenshots/messages, clear Snapchat history.

qa.question: Phone Repair
qa.answer: Remove Google account, clear gallery/WhatsApp, backup first, log out banking apps.

qa.question: Help with Problems
qa.answer: Ask techie friend, close gallery first.

qa.question: Trusted People
qa.answer: Prefer in-person for sensitive info, only close friends on WhatsApp.

qa.question: Code Words
qa.answer: Yes, nicknames/emojis with friends.

qa.question: Helping Others
qa.answer: Helped uncle install UPI, explained OTP safety.

qa.question: Permission Control
qa.answer: Yes, disable in settings for lesser-known apps.

qa.question: Warning Messages
qa.answer: Uninstall immediately unless sure safe.

qa.question: Access to Contacts/Photos
qa.answer: Think stored/used for ads or servers.

qa.question: Repair Hesitation
qa.answer: Yes, clean phone before repair, prefer branded centers.

qa.question: Repair Person Behavior
qa.answer: Yes, opened gallery to check camera, didn’t like it.

qa.question: Password Use
qa.answer: Fingerprint and PIN, only I know.

qa.question: Local vs International Apps
qa.answer: Trust based on reviews/developer, not country.

qa.question: Tech Help
qa.answer: Friend from CS, Google, Reddit.

qa.question: Social Influence
qa.answer: Friends share scam warnings, dad warns about banking frauds.

scenarios.Broken Phone: Log out apps, delete sensitive stuff, backup, prefer branded repair.
scenarios.Sharing with Family: Hide notifications or disable pop-ups for private apps.
scenarios.Giving Away Phone: Format completely, log out Google, erase storage.
scenarios.Cloud Backup Surprise: Surprised deleted photos stayed in cloud, check Google Photos settings.
scenarios.Free Public WiFi: Avoid banking, use VPN if needed.
scenarios.Lottery Call: Block scam calls or play along without sharing info.
scenarios.Friend Needs Help: Confirm identity, send money only if sure.
